DataShape.description: Definition of an edge thing registered with a Microserver and its connection information
DataShape.name: TunnelEndpoint

FieldDefinition.description: Location of the client application that will use the tunnel
FieldDefinition.name: appUri

FieldDefinition.description: Host that the tunnel will connect to
FieldDefinition.name: host

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the tunnel registered with the edge thing
FieldDefinition.name: name

FieldDefinition.description: The number of connections required to initilaize the tunnel
FieldDefinition.name: numConnects

FieldDefinition.description: Port that the tunnel will connect to
FieldDefinition.name: port
